1280110.name: DC Universe Online™ - Episode 37: Birds of Prey
1280110.description:
Help Harley Quinn, Black Canary, The Huntress, Poison Ivy, and Catwoman - the newly formed Birds of Prey - reach Oracle (aka Batgirl / Barbara Gordon). Lex Luthor has detonated his own LexCorp Tower, sent Metropolis spiraling into chaos, and has Oracle in his sights. It will be up to Oracle’s closest allies to uncover and put a stop to Luthor’s plans before time runs out!

Key Features:

  • New and Updated Characters including the Birds of Prey
  • Face Ferocious Super-Villains like Lobo, Amazo, and Brimstone.
  • Experience New Locations like Oracle’s iconic Clock Tower base and Lex’s Volcano Mining Facility.
  • Earn New Rewards including The Huntress-inspired Retribution style and the Harley Quinn-inspired Jester style.
